name: UColorInputDeviceCurveProperty
doc:
A property that can be used to change the color of an input device's light over time with a curve

NOTE: This property has platform specific implementations and may behave differently per platform.
See the docs for more details on each platform.

ColorData: Default color data that will be used by default. Device Specific overrides will be used when the current input device matches
DeviceOverrideData: A map of device specific color data. If no overrides are specified, the Default hardware data will be used
